hero.heading: Terms & Conditions
hero.subtitle: Rules, rights, and responsibilities for using the official website of the Banadir Regional Administration (BRA).

intro: This document is an electronic record generated by a digital system and does not require any physical or digital signatures. It is published in accordance with Somalia’s legal and administrative principles governing digital services, electronic information, and public-sector communication.

These Terms and Conditions outline the rules, rights, and responsibilities that govern access to and use of the official website of the Banadir Regional Administration (BRA), accessible at https://bra.gov.so (hereinafter referred to as the “Website”).
ownership: Unless otherwise stated, all content on this Website—including text, graphics, logos, multimedia, downloadable materials, and software—is the property of the Banadir Regional Administration. All materials are protected under applicable copyright, public-sector intellectual property, and administrative laws. Users may not copy, reproduce, publish, upload, distribute, or modify any content without the prior written permission of BRA, except for brief quotations used for educational or journalistic purposes consistent with fair-use principles.
acceptance: By accessing or using this Website, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not accept any part of these terms, you must discontinue use of the Website immediately.
definitions: “User,” “You,” or “Your” refers to any individual or entity accessing or using the Website.
“BRA,” “Administration,” “We,” “Our,” or “Us” refers to the Banadir Regional Administration.
“Party” or “Parties” refers to both the User and BRA collectively, or to either one individually, as applicable.
“Content” refers to all information, data, materials, and media displayed on the Website.
externalLinks: This Website may include links to external websites or platforms operated by third parties. These links are provided solely for convenience and informational purposes. BRA does not control, endorse, or assume responsibility for the accuracy, security, or privacy practices of such third-party websites. Users access external links at their own risk.
liability: To the maximum extent permitted by law, BRA shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your access to or use of the Website. This includes, but is not limited to, damages related to errors, system interruptions, inaccuracies, delays, malware, or loss of data.
responsibilities: Use the Website lawfully and in accordance with all applicable regulations.
Do not attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the Website, its servers, or connected networks.
Do not upload, transmit, or distribute viruses, malware, or harmful code.
Do not interfere with Website functionality or with other users’ experiences.
Do not use automated tools (such as bots, scrapers, or crawlers) to harvest content or interact with the Website without authorization.
termination: BRA reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to suspend or terminate your access to the Website without prior notice if your actions violate these Terms and Conditions, applicable laws, or pose a risk to public systems, other users, or the integrity of BRA digital services.
law: These Terms and Conditions are governed by the laws and administrative regulations of the Federal Republic of Somalia. Any disputes arising from the use of the Website shall fall under the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent courts of Somalia.
changes: BRA may revise, update, or modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes take effect immediately upon being posted on this page. Users are responsible for reviewing this page regularly to stay informed of updates.
